title: • Very fat font, what's its name, please?
content:
Hello -

Does someone know the "EXACT" name of the very fat font?  
And where I could buy it?

Thank you, have a nice day…

- Dimitri

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011012800im_/http:/typophile.com/files/tomateFontFatHugeTypoLogoLeavesCocoBlue_5767.jpg)
author: dimitri_c

comments.content:
Good work, as always, Akira.  
BTW, a modest suggestion for persons trying to identify a font. Sometimes the sample image includes the font name, as it does in this case:  
"tomateFontFatHugeTypoLogoLeavesCocoBlue\_5767.jpg"  
Never hurts to check the obvious.  
Don
